description:
At Shay & Associates Law Firm, we want to help you get back on your feet. Suffering a personal injury often means facing a number of financial and personal hardships. The team at our Decatur, Illinois, office understands how difficult it is to see medical bills and wonder how you will pay for them. We know that you have questions about what the future may hold. We compassionately guide you through the legal system and toward the compensation you need for recovery.

The attorneys at our law firm work directly with insurance companies on your behalf. We have a proven track record of securing significant verdicts and settlements for our clients, such as:

•$2.8 million following a motor vehicle accident

•$1.5 million in a medical negligence case

•$1 million on behalf of a victim who suffered a permanent brain injury

We have helped thousands of families and injured workers across the state obtain the funds necessary to pay for rehabilitation, treatment and property damage. Our attorneys have more than three decades of experience proving fault and holding defendants financially responsible. The founder of our practice, Timothy Shay, has earned the highest peer rating possible of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell.

Working with us means that you have experience and knowledge on your side. Our attorneys do everything they can to make the claims process easy on you. Shay & Associates Law Firm offers free initial consultations.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating™ fall into two categories – legal ability and general ethical standards.
